testCases.title: Other Channels Listing and Display
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality of the Other Channels listing, including column display and pagination.
testCases.expectedResult: The Other Channels list should display all messages from different channels with correct information in appropriate columns.

steps.stepDescription: Login to the system with valid credentials.
steps.expectedResult: User should be successfully logged in.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the Other Channels section.
steps.expectedResult: Other Channels listing page should load with message records displayed.

steps.stepDescription: Verify all expected columns are present in the message listing.
steps.expectedResult: Columns should include: Date, Direction, Phone, Extension, Source, Messages, Replies, Disposition, and other relevant columns.

steps.stepDescription: Verify message records display correct information.
steps.expectedResult: Each message record should display appropriate data in all columns.

steps.stepDescription: Verify different source types are displayed correctly (WhatsApp, Safepal, Walkin, etc.).
steps.expectedResult: Different source types should be clearly indicated in the Source column.

steps.stepDescription: Test the pagination controls if multiple pages of messages exist.
steps.expectedResult: Pagination controls should navigate between pages of message records.

steps.stepDescription: Verify message and reply counts are displayed correctly.
steps.expectedResult: Message and reply counts should accurately reflect the conversation activity.

testCases.title: View WhatsApp Conversation
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to view and interact with WhatsApp conversations.
testCases.expectedResult: WhatsApp conversations should be displayed correctly with message history and interaction options.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the Other Channels section.
steps.expectedResult: Other Channels listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Locate a WhatsApp message in the list.
steps.expectedResult: WhatsApp messages should be identifiable by the Source column showing "whatsApp".

steps.stepDescription: Click on the WhatsApp message record.
steps.expectedResult: Conversation view should open showing the WhatsApp chat history with the contact.

steps.stepDescription: Verify message bubbles are displayed in a chat-like format.
steps.expectedResult: Messages should be displayed in conversation bubbles with timestamps.

steps.stepDescription: Verify contact information is displayed at the top (phone number and channel).
steps.expectedResult: Contact header should show "whatsApp" and the phone number.

steps.stepDescription: Verify message timestamps are displayed correctly.
steps.expectedResult: Each message should show time sent and days ago information.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the Edit button is present if applicable.
steps.expectedResult: Edit button should be visible at the top right of the conversation view.

steps.stepDescription: Locate and test the message input field if available.
steps.expectedResult: Message input field should be available for responding to the conversation.

steps.stepDescription: Test sending a message response if functionality exists.
steps.expectedResult: Message should be sent and appear in the conversation history.

steps.stepDescription: Test returning to the message list from the conversation view.
steps.expectedResult: Back button should return to the Other Channels listing.

testCases.title: View Walkin Conversation
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to view and interact with Walkin conversations.
testCases.expectedResult: Walkin conversations should be displayed correctly with message history and interaction options.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the Other Channels section.
steps.expectedResult: Other Channels listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Locate a Walkin message in the list.
steps.expectedResult: Walkin messages should be identifiable by the Source column showing "walkin".

steps.stepDescription: Click on the Walkin message record.
steps.expectedResult: Conversation view should open showing the Walkin interaction history.

steps.stepDescription: Verify message display format for Walkin conversations.
steps.expectedResult: Messages should be displayed in an appropriate format for Walkin interactions.

steps.stepDescription: Verify contact or agent information is displayed at the top.
steps.expectedResult: Header should show "Walkin" and relevant identification information.

steps.stepDescription: Verify message timestamps are displayed correctly.
steps.expectedResult: Each message should show time sent and days ago information.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the Edit button is present if applicable.
steps.expectedResult: Edit button should be visible at the top right of the conversation view.

steps.stepDescription: Test the specific interaction options available for Walkin conversations.
steps.expectedResult: Walkin-specific interaction options should function correctly.

steps.stepDescription: Test returning to the message list from the conversation view.
steps.expectedResult: Back button should return to the Other Channels listing.

testCases.title: View Safepal Report
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to view detailed information from Safepal reports.
testCases.expectedResult: Safepal reports should display structured case information with all relevant details.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the Other Channels section.
steps.expectedResult: Other Channels listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Locate a Safepal message in the list.
steps.expectedResult: Safepal messages should be identifiable by the Source column showing "safepal".

steps.stepDescription: Click on the Safepal message record.
steps.expectedResult: Report view should open showing the detailed Safepal report information.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the Safepal ID is displayed at the top.
steps.expectedResult: Header should show "SafePal" and the unique report ID.

steps.stepDescription: Verify timestamp information is displayed correctly.
steps.expectedResult: Timestamp field should show the report submission date and time.

steps.stepDescription: Verify reporter information is displayed correctly.
steps.expectedResult: Reporter Nickname field should show the reporter's nickname.

steps.stepDescription: Verify category information is displayed correctly.
steps.expectedResult: Category field should show the incident category (e.g., Distress).

steps.stepDescription: Verify victim information is displayed correctly.
steps.expectedResult: Victim Name, Age, and Gender fields should show the victim's information.

steps.stepDescription: Verify perpetrator information is displayed correctly.
steps.expectedResult: Perpetrator Name, Age, and Gender fields should show the perpetrator's information.

steps.stepDescription: Test returning to the message list from the report view.
steps.expectedResult: Back button should return to the Other Channels listing.

testCases.title: Search and Filter Messages
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to search and filter messages in the Other Channels section.
testCases.expectedResult: Search and filter functionality should allow users to find specific messages based on various criteria.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the Other Channels section.
steps.expectedResult: Other Channels listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Locate and click the Search button.
steps.expectedResult: Search interface should appear with search fields.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by phone number.
steps.expectedResult: Search results should show messages matching the entered phone number.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by date or date range.
steps.expectedResult: Search results should show messages within the specified date range.

steps.stepDescription: Test filtering by source (WhatsApp, Safepal, Walkin).
steps.expectedResult: Search results should show only messages from the selected source.

steps.stepDescription: Test filtering by direction (Inbound, Outbound).
steps.expectedResult: Search results should show only messages with the selected direction.

steps.stepDescription: Test combining multiple search criteria.
steps.expectedResult: Search results should match all specified criteria.

steps.stepDescription: Test the List view button.
steps.expectedResult: Messages should display in list format.

steps.stepDescription: Test the Reports view button if available.
steps.expectedResult: Messages should display in report/chart format if applicable.

steps.stepDescription: Test the Download button.
steps.expectedResult: Message data should download in the specified format.

testCases.title: Message Response and Interaction
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to respond to messages and interact with conversations from different channels.
testCases.expectedResult: Users should be able to respond to messages and perform appropriate actions for each channel type.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the Other Channels section.
steps.expectedResult: Other Channels listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Open a WhatsApp conversation.
steps.expectedResult: WhatsApp conversation view should open.

steps.stepDescription: Locate and use the message input field to compose a response.
steps.expectedResult: Message input field should allow text entry.

steps.stepDescription: Send the response message.
steps.expectedResult: Message should be sent and appear in the conversation history.

steps.stepDescription: Return to the message list and verify message count update.
steps.expectedResult: Message count in the list should reflect the new message.

steps.stepDescription: Open a Safepal report and identify action options.
steps.expectedResult: Appropriate action options for Safepal reports should be available.

steps.stepDescription: Perform an available action for the Safepal report (e.g., escalate, respond).
steps.expectedResult: Action should be processed successfully.

steps.stepDescription: Test any available quick response templates or predefined messages.
steps.expectedResult: Quick response options should be available and functional.

steps.stepDescription: Test the process of creating a case from a channel message if available.
steps.expectedResult: Case creation from message should function correctly.

steps.stepDescription: Test message disposition or status update functionality if available.
steps.expectedResult: Message disposition or status should update correctly.

testCases.title: Channel Integration and Message Reception
testCases.description: This test case verifies that messages from different channels are properly received and displayed in the system.
testCases.expectedResult: Messages from all integrated channels should be correctly received, processed, and displayed in the Other Channels section.

steps.stepDescription: Ensure the system is configured to receive messages from WhatsApp.
steps.expectedResult: WhatsApp integration should be active.

steps.stepDescription: Send a test message to the system via WhatsApp if possible.
steps.expectedResult: Message should be received and appear in the Other Channels list.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the Safepal integration is functioning correctly.
steps.expectedResult: Safepal reports should be received and displayed properly.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the Walkin channel is functioning correctly.
steps.expectedResult: Walkin interactions should be recorded and displayed properly.

steps.stepDescription: Verify any other integrated channels are functioning correctly.
steps.expectedResult: All other integrated channels should be receiving and displaying messages properly.

steps.stepDescription: Test notification or alert functionality for new messages if applicable.
steps.expectedResult: System should notify users of new incoming messages as configured.

steps.stepDescription: Verify message metadata is captured correctly (timestamp, source, etc.).
steps.expectedResult: All message metadata should be accurately recorded and displayed.

steps.stepDescription: Test system behavior when receiving messages during high volume periods.
steps.expectedResult: System should handle message reception properly during high volume.
